unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi is a critical initiative for talent acquisition. We aim to attract bright minds like Raju Rastogi from '3 Idiots' to bolster our teams. Our recruitment process, starting October 2024, focuses on practical skills and problem-solving abilities. Attractive compensation packages, starting at Rs. 10 LPA, will be offered. Internships are also available.
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi is a critical initiative for talent acquisition. We aim to attract bright minds like Raju Rastogi from 'three Idiots' to bolster our teams. Our recruitment process, starting October two thousand and twenty four, focuses on practical skills and problem-solving abilities. Attractive compensation packages, starting at rupee ten L P A, will be offered. Internships are also available.
